sen.j: 正面通（しょうめんどおり）は京都市の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Shomen-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Kyoto City.
Shomen-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Shomen-dori Street is a street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 大和大路通の方広寺から千本通まで。
sen.e: This street runs from Hoko-ji Temple on Yamatooji-dori Street to Senbon-dori Street.
The street runs from Hoko-ji Temple on Yamatooji-dori Street to Senbon-dori Street.
The street runs from Hoko-ji Temple on Yamatooji-dori Street to Senbon-dori Street.

sen.j: 渉成園（枳殻邸）、東本願寺、西本願寺などで中断する。
sen.e: It stops at Shoseien (Kikoutei), Higashi-Hogan-ji Temple, and Nishi-Hongan-ji Temple.
It stops at Shoseien (Kikoutei), Higashi-Hogan-ji Temple, and Nishi-Hongan-ji Temple.
It stops at Shoseien (Kikokutei) garden, Higashi-Hogan-ji Temple, and Nishi-Hongan-ji Temple.
sen.cmt: 「枳殻邸」のスペルミスを訂正、 "Shoseien (Kikokutei) garden"としました。

sen.j: 渉成園と不明門通（この付近では烏丸通と一体）の間では中珠数屋町通とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: It is called Nakajuzuyamachi-dori Street between Shoseien and Akezunomon-dori Street (it is unified with Karasuma-dori Street around this area).
It is called Nakajuzuyamachi-dori Street between Shoseien and Akezunomon-dori Street (it joins Karasuma-dori Street around this area).
It is called Nakajuzuyamachi-dori Street between Shoseien garden and Akezunomon-dori Street (it joins Karasuma-dori Street around this area).

sen.j: 正面通の名称は、方広寺の京の大仏の正面につながる通りであることに由来する。
sen.e: The name of Shomen-dori Street is come from that a street connects to the front of the Buddha of Kyo in Hoko-ji Temple.
The name Shomen-dori Street comes from a street which connects the front of the Buddha of Kyo in Hoko-ji Temple.
The name Shomen-dori Street comes from a street which connects the front of the Buddha of Kyo in Hoko-ji Temple.

sen.j: 大和大路通から本町通 (京都)までの間は歩道と中央分離帯の整備された広い通りだが、それ以外の区間は対面通行は可能であるが道幅は狭い。
sen.e: There are walkways and maintained wide streets between Yamatooji-dori Street and Honmachi-dori Street, except that section its available to walk on the side of the street facing oncoming traffic, but the width of street is narrow.
Walkways and a central median which create a wide lane are maintained between Yamatooji-dori Street and Honmachi-dori Street, while other areas are narrow although it is still two-ways.
Walkways and a central median which create a wide lane are maintained between Yamatooji-dori Street and Honmachi-dori Street, while other areas are narrow although it is still two-ways.

sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更
